tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RentalProperties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    property_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_request_id INT,
    maintenance_request_details TEXT,
    task_id INT,
    task_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_requests (
    request_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    request_date DATE,
    request_description TEXT,
    request_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE management_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    task_assigned_to VARCHAR(50),
    task_due_date DATE,
    task_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE PropertyManagementTasks (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_id INT,
  task_description VARCHAR(255),
  task_due_date DATE,
  task_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ManagementTasks (
	task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	property_id INT,
	task_description TEXT,
	task_assigned_to TEXT,
	task_due_date DATE
);
